page.name: Public Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Public Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Public Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenances
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Public Cloud's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [WAW][Object Storage] - PCS/PCA
incidents.message: Start Time : 03/11/2022 22:00 UTC End Time : 03/11/2022 23:05 UTC Root cause :A hardware had a malfunction on one of our loadbalancer Service status :Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

incidents.name: [GRA][Public Cloud] - CloudDB databases
incidents.message: Start Time : 03/11/2022 17:00 UTC End Time : 03/11/2022 20:30 UTC Service impact : Mongodb service with flavour db1-2 and db1-4 might have experienced outage during the incident time. Root cause : Minor version update of MongoDB agent caused an outage on small instances. Current status : Resolved

incidents.name: [Scheduled] [GRA][Public Cloud] - Upgrade network equipment
incidents.message: Start time : 03/11/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 03/11/2022 20:28UTC Service impact : The following public cloud instances will be impacted in GRA5 region: a1096462-077c-4989-b35e-14aa6d92df80 9df482da-0563-4f19-a96e-499ce2c1f281 469051fc-60b6-4e5f-8062-f1834a8412ed b907ceae-18d6-4556-9c96-e34993ed22de 1229bcb8-bc96-4cb0-b588-41989483efe4 94b8e8f1-9953-41a5-943a-0f713a0ffab6 5e3190c0-50cf-4abb-b657-beb0ac169ee5 2b941c30-6547-40e8-98ef-3cd8a643bd96 27902f7e-e964-40f9-9975-b3360c2c77ca f43e1dcb-b3c0-49e9-a2e1-895e0a8651cb aa56e040-126b-45ba-918f-1a88befbf142 865c2280-0663-493c-8750-a89e6e7f0ca4 128984fc-b758-4046-bfcf-1dfcfdf80684 4efc1412-1c3e-4eae-bed8-b20024c5187b 91593dde-5cb2-4b64-9c6a-ed84b4315084 702ed084-db3c-4479-a1e4-f4c5e0b94cf3 8dd9eadf-ff5a-48be-9c05-88c0e0f954df for 20 minutes while the network equipment is rebooted. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we need to upgrade a network device to fix a bug.

incidents.name: [Scheduled] [EU/CA][Public Cloud] - Network FailoverIP
incidents.message: Start time : 03/11/2022 15:30 UTC End time : 03/11/2022 17:00 UTC Service impact : Customers may experience some bug fixing when ordering a floating IP Service improvement : Exploit the network to improve the code for the bulk filtering method in the manager for the creation of new PCI instances and the selection of private networks.

incidents.name: [SBG5][Public Cloud] - Volume Snapshot (CEPH) II Block storage
incidents.message: Start Time : 02/11/2022 13:37 UTC End Time : 02/11/2022 14:16 UTC Root cause : Servers damaged due to a cooling system issue Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

incidents.name: [EU/CA][Compute/Managed Kubernetes Service] - Public Cloud & K8S degradation
incidents.message: Start time : 24/10/2022 17:30 UTC End time : 24/10/2022 18:00 UTC Service impact : We are experiencing disruptions on : + Tasks of the Public Cloud and VPS instances + Invoicing of the instances + Delivery of new projects + Performance degradation or blocking on K8S Clusters Root cause : Our technical teams have determined that the disruption is due to a network problem that has blocked an internal platform. In order to correct the problem permanently, our teams will be upgrading our platform. We apologize for the inconvenience.
